text: by Maggie Bullock | Photographed by Gilles Bensimon | July 19, 2018 To the naked eye, it appears that remarkably little has changed about Elle Macpherson in the quarter - century since she was an 18 - year - old Aussie surf junkie who started modeling to pay for law - school textbooks. Her legs are still infinite and impossibly lean, her hair still tosses like it ’ s in the gust of a perpetual wind machine, and her smile still radiates the just - try - to - keepup - with - me tomboy energy that made her the sex symbol of her generation. But Macpherson is in fact human, she swears, and around the time she turned 50 in 2014, she was experiencing symptoms that will sound familiar to even non supermodels. “
